name: Snowrifters VEX
description:
SNOWRIFTERS VEHICLE EXHIBITION

This is a Virtual Vehicle Exhibition in a museum like environment where you can teleport around and look at the models.
A Showcase Room for the vehicles, some props and weapons from the race game Snowrifters.
Get an impression of the unique design from Timon Sager.
Snowrifters is currently in development. This is a little teaser, to see how the vehicle will look in game.

Thank you for your time.
